name: Drown
lyrics:
[ti:Drown (feat. Clinton Kane)]
[ar:Martin Garrix/Clinton Kane]
[al:Drown (feat. Clinton Kane)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Drown - Martin Garrix (马丁·盖瑞斯)/Clinton Kane
[00:00.81]Lyrics by：Clinton Kane/Martijn Garritsen/Johnny Coffer/Jake Torrey/Steve Rusch
[00:01.63]Composed by：Clinton Kane/Martijn Garritsen/Johnny Coffer/Jake Torrey/Steve Rusch
[00:02.45]I've been tryna keep my distance (我努力保持距离)
[00:05.43]But in an instant you break me down (却被你瞬间击溃)
[00:10.42]I know better than to want you (我不该对你着迷)
[00:13.37]But I succumb to you without a doubt (但我无法抵抗你的魅力)
[00:17.66]Now the water is rising (如今越陷越深)
[00:19.38]And I'm too tired to swim (已无力挣扎)
[00:21.63]And my lungs just can't take it (身心疲惫)
[00:23.63]But I keep breathing you in so (就是无法将你释怀 所以)
[00:26.26]Tell me lies (欺骗我吧)
[00:27.70]Tell me painted truths (用谎言欺骗我吧)
[00:29.81]Anything at all to keep me close to you (随便怎样 只求能让我伴你左右)
[00:34.26]Pull me under (让我紧紧)
[00:35.85]The way you do (追随你)
[00:37.58]Tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you (今晚我想沉浸在你爱的海洋中)
[00:45.95]Anything at all to keep me close to you (随便怎样 只求能让我伴你左右)
[00:53.62]Tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you (今晚我想沉浸在你爱的海洋中)
[01:01.90]Tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you (今晚我想沉浸在你爱的海洋中)
[01:09.76]Tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you (今晚我想沉浸在你爱的海洋中)
[01:14.58]I'm so used to your excuses (你的借口 我早已习惯)
[01:17.39]That when you bruise me I stick around (即使被你伤害 我也不肯离开)
[01:22.37]No point trying to make it out now (现在抽离 已没有意义)
[01:25.41]Rather be sinking than go without (宁愿深陷其中 也不愿追悔莫及)
[01:29.48]And now the water is rising (如今越陷越深)
[01:31.60]And I'm too tired to swim (已无力挣扎)
[01:33.65]And my lungs just can't take it (身心疲惫)
[01:35.63]But I keep breathing you in so (就是无法将你释怀 所以)
[01:38.44]Tell me lies (欺骗我吧)
[01:39.83]Tell me painted truths (用谎言欺骗我吧)
[01:41.82]Anything at all to keep me close to you (随便怎样 只求能让我伴你左右)
[01:46.36]Pull me under (让我紧紧)
[01:48.00]The way you do (追随你)
[01:49.68]Tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you (今晚我想沉浸在你爱的海洋中)
[01:58.02]Anything at all to keep me close to you (随便怎样 只求能让我伴你左右)
[02:05.67]Tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you (今晚我想沉浸在你爱的海洋中)
[02:13.77]Tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you (今晚我想沉浸在你爱的海洋中)
[02:21.69]Tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you (今晚我想沉浸在你爱的海洋中)

[02:27.79]Tell me painted truths (用谎言欺骗我吧)
